name: 70% Arabica - 30% Robusta Roasted Coffee Beans
description:
• Enjoy the ultimate farm-to-cup experience with the nuanced flavours of shade-grown coffee beans (Bulk-Grade) grown in the verdant, misty hills of the Bababudangiri Range in Chikkamagaluru, Karnataka. 
  • All our coffee is of the highest quality, shade-grown amidst lush native jungle and fruit trees at high elevations of 4500 to 5000 feet.
  • FLAVOUR NOTES: This particular blend gets its layered and nuanced flavours from the Arabica beans, with the Robusta beans adding a subtle amount of brightness and acidity.
  • DRINKING PREFERENCES: Best enjoyed black. Great for brewing an Espresso, Ristretto, or Cortado.
  • Our 1 kg and 5 kg offerings are ideal for stocking up your office pantry or for coffee machines at any food retail outlet.
